extendedInfo.description: Simply as its name: this app vibrate your phone when a call is ended.Users can set this feature on/off, and the vibrating duration.This app is so simple, so no screenshot:-)Please email me if it does not work right(Thanks Addison, Liu, Sam for testing)0.0.8: Add Germany support.

reviews.comment: It works pretty much all the time, only didn\'t work like twice, over all great app! :) ~boogie~
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: gr8 app need call connect vibrate also
reviews.comment: i need a same software for call connect alert like when our outgoing call got answered then phone will vibrate just like your callend vibrate btw callend vibrate great app giving it 5 stars
reviews.author: sukhdev singh

reviews.comment: It saves that embarrassing moment when your call has dropped but you have carried on talking
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: 5 star app, works perfect, never had any issue after months of use. Evo
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Simple genius. Should just be a standard feature/option. I dont notice a delay on my Epic. Thanks!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Love it! No more talking into dead air and trying to figure out what point in conversation you lost the call... yay!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Simple & awesome app, ignore the comment below me about the GPS, it doesn\'t ask for location permissions...
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Down load this stop getting caught talking when u thought u hung up..
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Works well
reviews.comment: Works well. Does what it is suppose to do. Please also make app that vibrate phone until call is connected. Will help ppl minimize radiation exposure.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great.
reviews.comment: Perfect for when I\'m in a loud environment and I don\'t hear the usual \'beep\' when a call is lost. Love it.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Useful simple app. Use low memory too!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: THANK YOU! I love this app. No more going on like a goober for 10 minutes and then realizing you have been talking to yourself. Great app.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Thank you, very useful. Call connect is also helpful. Pls write this app.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Works like it says. Wish it was a little faster. Still great tho.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Love it!
reviews.comment: This is perfect. I thought i had hung up my phone from a conversation and boy i did not. The person heard everything i was talking about. Talking about getting caught:) so this is perfect. Thank you.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: works 100% on both outgoing and incoming calls. very useful, a must have! thx dev. G1 1.6
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Save money,blushes.
reviews.comment: Phoned boss,icant go into work i am ill.thought call ended.walked into pub ordered beers while slagging off boss using realy colorful langague,no longer work for bosses firm.phoned supicous girlfriend,assured her not with exgirlfriend .ended call, chatting to exgirlfriend,my present girlfriend still connected hears everything not good.also connected to other phones sometimes for hours is expensive .this is a godsend
reviews.author: woze tu

reviews.comment: Great.. no more talking to myself when I hit a dead spot or the call drops.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Wonderful, wonderful!
reviews.comment: Perfect. Simple. No more talking to the air. Works flawlessly on two different Moto Droids.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: AWESOME APP
reviews.comment: My old phone vibrated upon hang-up or disconnection/dropped call. My current phone does not have this function, so this App fixes the issue. No I KNOW when the call has dropped and can confirm that the call has been disconnected when hanging up - no more wasted minutes and battery time! App is VERY small footprint on the phone memory and should be installed on ALL Android phones!
reviews.author: A Google User
